video.title: Violetta
video.synopsis: Violetta is a teen who returns from her time in Europe to her native Argentina, where she finds love and discovers her musical talents.

episodes.synopsis: After many years abroad, Violetta moves home to Buenos Aires with her dad. By chance she meets the charming boy Tomas, and is instantly interested!
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Violetta refuses to wear the drab dress her dad's fiancé has picked out. Angie finds another dress which is perfect -- it belonged to Violetta's mum.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Delivering pizza to Studio 21 Tomas gets an unexpected admirer -- Ludmila. But Ludmila, the school's self-proclaimed "queen", has a boyfriend -- Leon.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Jade is broke and tries to manipulate Violetta's dad Germán to hasten the wedding. Violetta sees Ludmila chat with Tomas and assumes they are lovers.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Tomas tries to tell Violetta that nothing is going on between him and Ludmila. He thinks Violetta is the maid's child, and she lets him believe it.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Ludmila's boyfriend Leon is jealous of Tomas and tries to get him fired. And Ludmila tries to create problems between Violetta and Tomas.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Violetta tries to make new friends at Studio 21. Ludmila dislikes her and tries to ruin the studio party for her, telling it is a costume party.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Ludmila challenges Violetta to a musical duel. Hoping that she will be happy, Tomas tells Violetta that he will also start in Studio 21.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Tomas goes home to Violetta, trying to convince her the video she saw was fake. Violetta's dad, Germán, arrives and the conversation is interrupted.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Ludmila, still jealous that Tomas likes Violetta, hatches a new insidious plan to get Violetta to believe Tomas' feelings are not real.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Tomas does the Studio 21 audition. He gets stage fright and asks Violetta for help, she joins him on stage and they sing a song together.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Tomas tries to talk Violetta into taking the Studio 21 audition. He thinks she should be a full-time student, not just taking private piano lessons.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Violetta's new pals at Studio 21 try to persuade her to study full-time. She realizes she has to lie to her father as he would never accept it.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Violetta decides to explore the house. In the attic she finds all her mothers old things which were hidden, and becomes furious with her father.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Reading her mum's diary Violetta sees how important music and song was to her. Violetta will do the Studio 21 audition with support from her new pals.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Ludmila envies Violetta, and hatches an insidious plan to stop Violetta from doing the dance part of the Studio 21 audition.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: One of the teachers at Studio 21 tries to sabotage Tomas' audition. Violetta's father, Germán, admits to Ramallo he is fond of Angie.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Francesca realizes Tomas is singing to Violetta, not to her. Violetta asks Leon for help to forget Tomas.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Ludmila tries to convince Tomas that Violetta is dating Leon. Luca arranges music nights at Resto Bar, Leon asks Violetta to perform there with him.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Violetta gets the feeling that Angie likes Germán. She herself tries to ignore Tomas and pretends that the friendship with Francesca means more.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Ludmila signs a contract without realizing it's for a commercial that pays peanuts... Violetta admits to Camila that she likes Tomas.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Violetta must decide if she wants to be with Tomas or be friends with Francesca. Tomas and Violetta go to the Resto Bar and the chemistry clicks.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Francesca is jealous of Tomas and Violetta. Jades brother Matias is just as broke as she is and secretly lives in Germán's house.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Francesca decides that Violetta's happiness is more important. Jade sees Angie talking with the school principal and thinks he's her boyfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Tomas tries to kiss Violetta, but it doesn't quite go as he imagined... Will they ever solve their problems and get to the dating part?
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Violetta is still confused about Tomas and Leon. Ludmila hatches a new plan against Tomas and Violetta -- and this time she might be successful...
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Irritated at Tomas, Violetta joins with Leon to get revenge. Matias, worried that Jade will abandon him when she becomes rich, makes an unusual plan.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Tomas is convinced Violetta likes Leon and asks her to choose between them because he thinks Leon has been behind their problems.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Ludmila creates a fake video showing Leon and Violetta as a couple. But if her father sees it, she may miss the chance to participate in the closing!
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Violetta still can't choose between Tomas or Leon. she finds out why the date with Tomas never materialized and new plans are made.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Leon warns Violetta against dating Tomas. They have a great date anyway, but then Tomas tells Violetta something unexpected about his future.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Violetta wants to tell her father the history behind Studio 21 so she can be in the concert. Angie also wonders if she should tell Germán the truth.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Ludmilla argues with Leon, and he refuses to sing with her. Tomas gets the chance - but will he show up? He's booked a flight for that same evening.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Violetta asks Germán to give Tomas' father a job so Tomas doesn't go to Spain. Germán refuses. Violetta sings in the café -- and has her first kiss!
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Violetta gets her first kiss -- but the boy isn't that happy. Ludmila finds out about Violetta's plan to get Tomas' father a job and interferes.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: The big concert nears, and the studio's reputation is at stake! Germán and Jade's wedding plans progress. Violetta wonders why Tomas is so wonderful.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Violetta still doesn't know if she wants to be with Tomas or Leon – or anyone at all. Jade finds out about Violetta's secret. Will she reveal it?
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Violetta's afraid her father will see her if she sings in the concert. Angie tells her to choose what's most important -- her dreams or her father.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Ludmila's contract forces her to do a commercial the same night as the concert and Violetta is asked to take her place. Will Germán really marry Jade?
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Violetta has a difficult choice to make: Shall she go to Jade and Germán's wedding party, or perform at the concert? Which will she choose?
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Violetta can't decide between the two boys she likes -- Leon and Tomas. Matias is arrested and Pablo has problems after the big concert.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Big changes in Studio 21, but Tomas doesn't think it's any better. Matias gets out of jail. Violetta receives disturbing news from her father.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Still having problems choosing between Tomas and Leon, Violetta writes song about her feelings. Germán finds out what she thinks about Jade.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Violetta finally decides to tell the boy that she has chosen what she feels. But is she sure? She also finds out Jades plans for Violetta.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Violetta and Germán argue about her further education. Will they ever agree? A third boy enters Violettas complicated love life...
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Violetta is upset over Ludmilla's new relationship. Jade and Angie argue over Angie's return. Germán and Violetta are drawn into the turmoil.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Ludmilla creates more trouble for Violetta, and Jade plots against Violetta and Angie. A surprise party for Francesca makes things worse.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Francesca's party creates problems between Tomas and Violetta. Germán and Jade argue about Angie And the future of Studio 21 seems uncertain -- can the student help?
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Does Violetta really want to be with Leon? Tomas and Ludmila have difficulties. Ludmila barges into a meeting, but will it solve the problems?
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Violetta thinks it was Leon who asked her to the meeting, but that Ludmila forged the letter. Can Violetta prove that Ludmila is guilty?
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Violetta challenges Ludmila to a duel that will decide who will do the song they'll be singing together. Who will win the duel?
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: After a big fight, Violetta and Tomas completely give up on each other. Violetta accidentally sends Leon an email saying she wants him back.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Gregorio has Andres tell Tomas some bad things about Violetta that aren't true. Violetta finds out that Tomas and Ludmila are dating.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: After finding out that Tomas was expelled from the Studio because he protected her, Violetta tries to make up with him.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Violetta and Tomas decide to stay just friends. The students rebel against Gregorio and have a concert outside the Studio.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: A new exchange student from Italy named Federico arrives. Violetta doesn't like Federico at first, even when she finds out he's staying with her.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Federico threatens to tell Germán about Violetta's secret. But then Federico sings with Violetta and, admiring her talent, becomes friends with her.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: After signing up for the show, Violetta begins to doubt whether it's the right thing to do. Meanwhile, Federico seems to be interested in Violetta.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Federico's failed attempt to kiss Violetta ends in a confrontation with Leon. Federico comes clean, saying he shouldn't have tried to kiss Violetta.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Germán's unexpected return is making things difficult for Violetta. Federico tells Tomas that Ludmila tore up Violetta's application for the show.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Violetta is about to tell Germán the truth when a fan recognizes her, forcing her to lie. Tomas accuses Ludmila of destroying Violetta's entry form.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Marotti focuses the show on the contestants' personal lives instead of their talent, which causes the students to fight and nearly exposes a secret.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Violetta and the others try their best to finish round two of the reality show, which will leave only four contestants to enter the semi-finals.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Violetta's fans turn on her after Ludmila posts an incriminating video of Violetta acting like an arrogant "supernova."
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Violetta's friends post the unedited footage to prove Ludmila set Violetta up. Leon makes a sacrifice so that Violetta can return to the show.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: The remaining four contestants must sing and play an instrument at the same time, and the eliminated contestants will vote for the finalists.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: To sabotage the competition, Ludmila creates a flea infestation that leaves Violetta half asleep on the day of the semi-finals.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Violetta gets upset with Leon after she overhears him saying some insulting things about her to Ludmila.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Germán is still stunned by his kiss with Angie. The family is planning to attend a charity ball, but the event is at the same time as the finals.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Violetta wants to get back together with Leon, but she's worried he doesn't want to. The show is coming to an end, the winner to be chosen by a vote.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: After Ludmila reveals the identity of Violetta's aunt, Violetta is angry. Angie wants to tell Germán, but Violetta says it would be a bad idea.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Violetta finally meets her grandmother. Angelica decides to tell Germán the truth, but Violetta and Angie try to stop her from doing so.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Violetta and Leon share a dream of a beautiful and romantic song. The next day, they try to remember the tune, worried that they'll forget it.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: When Tomas comforts Violetta after Leon rejects her, Leon witnesses the act and tells Francesca, who becomes consumed with jealousy.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: After discovering who Angie really is, Jade tells Germán in front of everyone. Francesca discovers that Tomas still has feelings for Violetta.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Germán decides to move up his wedding day, and Violetta tries to talk him out of it. Violetta realizes that she has feelings for both Tomas and Leon.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Violetta seeks her grandmother's advice about her indecision between Tomas and Leon. Meanwhile, Germán sees a poster for the show.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: A huge argument breaks out when Germán learns the truth, and the wedding celebration is completely disrupted.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: The wedding ends in chaos, and Germán decides to leave for Buenos Aires with Violetta, who reluctantly says farewell to her friends.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Germán finally realizes that his daughter has a gift for singing. Violetta, meanwhile, makes a decision about the men in her life.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Three months later, the kids are reunited. Violetta reflects on the changes in her life and decides to talk with León about doing a live show.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Diego tries to woo Violetta, but she misses León, and though she doesn't know it, he misses her too. As classes begin, there's news about the Studio.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: León and Violetta sing together and feel the magic between them will bind them together forever. Diego won't give up on making Violetta his.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Violetta has a date with León, but she gets in a fight with her father, Germán, and can't make it on time. León starts questioning her love for him.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Diego apologizes to Violetta for causing her trouble, and León tries to contain his jealousy. Violetta visits León to confess her love for him.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: León gets in an accident at the arena. While he's receiving treatment, Violetta is trying to get Diego off her back. Lara sees them leave together.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Violetta talks with León and tries to get close to him, but he just wants to be friends. Angie comforts her when she can't find her mother's diary.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Violetta invites León to the movies, but Germán won't let her go on her date. Diego finishes writing the song for Violetta and gives it to her.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Violetta apologizes to León, but he's still hurt. Violetta is elated to find her mother's diary, not knowing it's all part of a nefarious plot.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: At the party at the mansion, Violetta sings the song she wrote with Diego's help. Though she tries, she can't keep Diego and León from facing off.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Germán kicks everyone out of the mansion, but Violetta tells him she didn't organize the party. León and Violetta get in a fight after Diego shows up.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: When Violetta's father is arrested, all the kids keep her company to show her their support. León goes to the mansion to try to comfort her.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Despite Diego's meddling, León manages to calm Violetta down. Violetta shows up for Diego's singing audition for the Studio.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: León and Violetta trust in their love for each other and decide to treat Diego like just another classmate and not to give in to his provocations.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Violetta manages to cheer Germán up, but a warrant is issued against him when some tricky maneuvers to obstruct the investigation are discovered.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Germán tells Violetta that they have to leave the mansion, and she decides to leave the Studio. Diego visits, but her friends avoid a feud with León.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: When Germán and Violetta are leaving the house, Esmeralda offers to forgive a debt. Violetta receives a scholarship at the Studio.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Diego tries to kiss Violetta, and although she rejects him, a camera is recording and it looks like they kissed. The recording goes missing.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: León thinks Violetta and Diego kissed. She offers an explanation, but he's doubtful. León confronts Diego, who says he and Violetta definitely kissed.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: León still can't believe the kiss never happened and tensions are rising, but Violetta avoids a fight. Violetta gets removed from the show.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: At the end of the show, Diego kisses Violetta. She feels guilty and looks for León, but he doesn't trust her anymore and decides to break up with her.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Violetta considers U-Mix's proposal, and León isn't sure where he really belongs, the Studio or the motocross arena. Diego is still after Violetta.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Germán gives Violetta permission to accept the proposal, as long as she keeps him informed. Violetta misses León, and he's still thinking of her too.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Diego shows León the video of Violetta kissing him by accident and he claims he put up the video with the kisses edited, but León doesn't believe him.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Germán is the new piano player at the Studio, but no one recognizes him, and Violetta, busy with U-Mix, is really missing her classmates.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Diego visits Violetta and they play the piano and sing together. At the party, León can't take his eyes off a girl, who turns out to be Lara.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: León is back at the arena and spending more time with Lara. Violetta changes her look for U-Mix, but she's uncomfortable with it. Diego comforts her.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Violetta hears León saying terrible things about her and ends up in the arms of Diego, who wants her to give up her dream. León stops showing up.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Violetta isn't comfortable with U-Mix, but she finally manages to make her way. León is trying to get over her and enjoys an afternoon with Lara.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: VIoletta is upset to see León leaving with Lara. She confronts him for it later. Before the show, she discovers she's lost her voice and can't sing.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: The show is over and everyone congratulates Violetta, never suspecting her of lip-synching. But León realizes what she did, and tensions are rising.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Lara tries to kiss León, but he politely tells her no and asks for more time. At a party, Violetta gets into an argument with León that ends badly.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: León tells Lara that he's thinking of leaving the Studio, and she encourages him to stay. Violetta catches the piano player with Germán's phone.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Violetta dreams of León, inspiring the lyrics for her next song. León, Lara and Violetta fall for a trap, and Violetta sees León and Lara kissing.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Violetta wants to leave the Studio, and Diego tries to comfort her. León knows Violetta saw him kiss Lara. He goes after her but finds her with Diego.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Violetta tells León that she still loves him, but he rejects her and says he's over her. Violetta loses her voice and decides to see a specialist.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Violetta doesn't end up going to the specialist, and she manages to sing better than ever. León can't stop thinking about her, but still isn't sure.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Violetta goes to meet up with León, but she finds out he's waiting for Lara. After some paperwork issues, the Studio and U-Mix can put on shows again.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Lara is afraid León won't be able to meet with the potential sponsor. León calls Violetta in the middle of the night.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Diego kisses Violetta, and she asks him not to hurt her. León stays to convince the businessman to be his sponsor, arriving just in time for the show.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: León wants to get closer to Violetta, but Diego gets in the way, and Violetta loses her voice again. Violetta is avoiding Diego.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Violetta has lost her voice, and though she can talk later, she's still not able to sing. León decides to leave the Studio.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: León is finally accepted in the Studio. Lara decides to ask Violetta if she has feelings for León. She doesn't have time to answer before he walks in.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: León can't hide his feelings for Violetta and sings her a love song. Diego, furious, confronts him in front of Lara. Violetta tells Diego the truth.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Violetta can sing again, but Germán, worried about his daughter's health, forbids it. León catches Diego plotting something.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Violetta can't leave U-Mix because of contractual obligation. León tries to warn her about Diego, but she just gets mad at him and refuses to listen.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Violetta isn't sure she loves Diego. He catches her looking at photos of León, but she tears them up. León's heart breaks when he finds the pieces.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Lara and León decide to focus on the upcoming races. Violetta trips and León runs to help her and tells her he loves her more than any man could.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Violetta pushes León away and denies her feelings for him, but she can't help but confess she can't get over him. Diego overhears the conversation.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: León accidentally calls Lara Violetta. She pretends she didn't hear it, but inside she's hurt. Feeling guilty, León works it out through music.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Though Carlo is moved to hear his daughter sing, Francesca has to return to Italia with her family. Lara wants to leave León and focus on her career.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Carlo finds out his daughter wants to move to Buenos Aires and agrees to let her stay with her aunt and uncle. Ludmila is furious with Lena.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Violetta promises to Diego she'll fight for their love. Guido finds Camila's notebook and mocks her. Germán is finally pressured into setting a date.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Diego can no longer hide his love for Violetta. Camila argues with Seba. Marco, Maxi and Lena make a plan to lock Fede and Ludmila in together.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Diego realizes he's in love with Violetta and he can't bear to hurt her with the truth. Lena finds out who Jeremías is and promises to keep it secret.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Violetta, Camila and Francesca help Naty after a fall, and it might not have been an accident. Antonio reproaches the teachers after Jackie resigns.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Violetta falls for Diego's trap. Camila and Francesca look for a replacement for Naty. After hearing Ludmila, Maroti apologizes to Federico.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Lara decides to follow Violetta's advice and stay away from León. The Studio is happy to welcome College 11. Germán pushes Jade out of the wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Violetta confesses to Jeremías she can't get over León. Marco tries to calm Francesca. Seba promises not to forget Camila during the Rock Bones tour.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Inspector Parodi and Jade crash Germán's wedding. Francesca thinks Ana is still in love with Marco and she hates it when she's around her boyfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Violetta, Francesca, Camila and Naty are the big winners. After finding out he's cheating, Angie argues with Germán. Ana apologizes to Marco.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Violetta refuses to listen to Diego's excuses. Francesca is furious with Marco for kissing Ana. Pablo tries to convince Angie not to leave the Studio.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: León walks in on an argument between Violetta and Lara. Camila takes out her anger on Broduey. Inspector Parodi suggests Matías spill the beans.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Germán isn't man enough to tell Violetta the truth. Fran falls for Ana's trap and thinks Marco lied to her. Ludmila is thinking about exposing Diego.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Diego is afraid of losing Violetta after telling her the truth. Germán tries to convince Angie not to go to France. Gregorio hides his birthmark.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Violetta supports Angie's decision to go to France and organizes a farewell party. All the kids want to win the competition organized by the Studio.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Germán comforts Violetta after Angie leaves. Ana tries to get close to Marco and confesses her love for him. Matías steals Inspector Parodi's laptop.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Violetta refuses to accept Germán's excuses. Camila and Guido reunite. Lara and León decide break their contract with Bermúdez, their only sponsor.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Ludmila changes her mind and hides the truth about Diego from Violetta. Francesca decides to leave Marco. Matías pulls a fast one on Inspector Parodi.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: León and Violetta are enjoying their friendship, until Diego and Lara mess it all up. Ludmila confronts Diego to show him nothing will faze Federico.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Violetta, León, Francesca and Diego celebrate their big win. Maxi confesses his love for Naty. Jade and Matías are trying to regain their freedom.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's happy to see Violetta at the Studio and find out she's going to Madrid, except Ludmila, who demands a trip to Spain to meet her fans.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Diego is happy to have found Violetta and spends the day around town with his girlfriend. León accompanies Francesca to the hotel, hiding his anger.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Violetta hopes León will confess why he broke up with Lara. Francesca pretends she didn't overhear Diego talking with Ludmila.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Francesca encourages Violetta to fight for León. Naty keeps her mouth shut for Ludmila. Camila and Broduey are determined to show they've changed.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: In her excitement, Violetta hugs León. Ludmila is beside herself after her plan goes awry. Naty is heartbroken, assuming Maxi will never forgive her.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Violetta avoids León and Lara, convinced they must be back together. Beto and Pablo are worried about their friend's change of attitude.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: Violetta thinks León is with Lara. Diego can't believe Gregorio is his father. It's complicated with Marco and Francesca's long-distance relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Violetta and León reunite and decide to try to rebuild their trust. Andrés finds a letter from Francesca and thinks his friend is in love with Marco.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Violetta decides to participate in the show. The kids try to come up with lyrics for the closing song. Jade hides in the mansion, looking for revenge.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Violetta and her friends are in the middle of the On Beat Tour with You Mix. It’s her birthday, and Vilu hopes to spend it with her loved ones.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Violetta’s friends prepare an open-air celebration before their last show on the tour. Soon they’ll be going back home.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: León isn’t satisfied being exclusively dedicated to You Mix; he needs time for his band. The students return to On Beat Studio as professionals.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: It’s clear that Priscila, Ludmila’s mother, and Germán like each other. Vilu accepts her father’s decision, while Ludmila wants to split them up.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Diego decides to help his father with his new project and has an announcement to make. Germán and Vilu join Priscila and Ludmila for a special dinner.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: A motocross accident leaves León unconscious at the hospital. Everyone hopes he gets better soon, and Vilu stays there by his side.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: León manages to wake up and starts gradually recovering. His friends give him a warm welcome back to On Beat Studio.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Vilu offers to help Alex get into On Beat Studio. Diego and his friends start fixing up the new place Gregorio is going to be directing.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Vilu is involved in Ludmila’s plan to separate her mother from Germán. León is jealous of Alex and isn’t afraid of hiding it from Violetta.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Art Rebel, Gregorio and Diego’s new study, is open for business. The inaugural party brings friends both old and new.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: León has a slight relapse that has him thinking about his future. Germán and Priscila are ready to take their relationship to the next level.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: The news of Germán and Priscila’s pending cohabitation is not well received by their respective daughters. León makes a choice and an announcement.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Vilu tries to get León to come to his senses and stay with On Beat Studio, leading to a huge argument between the two.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Vilu and Ludmila go on a trip with their parents to try to get to know each other better, giving them a chance to spend some time together.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Vilu is happy with Angie’s surprise visit, as she needs her now more than ever. Priscila isn’t too happy to have Violetta’s aunt around.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Francesca is confused, and Diego can’t hide his feelings for her anymore. Federico visits Ludmila, but things don’t go as planned.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Vilu and Ludmila return to Buenos Aires to fulfill their obligation with On Beat Studio. León has some good news for Violetta.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: The On Beat Studio students are in high gear rehearsing for the tour. Francesca and Diego can’t decide whether to fight for their love or give up.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: León is afraid Alex will get in the way of his love story with Vilu. The students get ready for the general rehearsal before going on tour.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Diego and Francesca decide to start their own love story, albeit in secret for now. Everything has to be perfect for the first show on the tour.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: The students and teachers at On Beat Studio are devastated to hear some very sad news. They have to turn to each other to face such a loss.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Violetta feels León drifting away from her when she needs him most, and they decide to break up. Germán and Priscila announce their wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: You Mix decides not to continue sponsoring On Beat Studio, and the students are heartbroken. Violetta decides not to continue with the sponsor.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Vilu is happy Angie is back; she needs her after what happened with Antonio. The students are shocked when Pablo quits as On Beat Studio director.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: To get closer to León, Violetta visits his garage disguised as Roxy. As part of the plan, Vilu brings Francesca along, disguised as Fausta.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: León offers Roxy and Fausta his garage to rehearse in. He’s obviously interested in Roxy, and Violetta takes advantage to keep him by her side.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Gregorio hears Roxy’s voice and decides to call her for an audition for On Beat Studio. Francesca wants to call off the plan: Diego is suspicious.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Gregorio hears Roxy’s voice and decides to call her for an audition for On Beat Studio. Francesca wants to call off the plan: Diego is suspicious.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Violetta is furious with León, who seems more interested in Roxy than her. Ludmila waits to hear from You Mix after auditioning with Vilu’s song.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Gregorio starts rehearsals for On Beat Studio’s next show. Germán and Priscila’s wedding day arrives.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Ludmila and Violetta have started off on the wrong foot. And Vilu has to come up with a way for both her and Roxy to participate in the presentation.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Ludmila apologizes to Vilu for stealing her song for the You Mix presentation and promises to talk with Marotti. Violetta can’t get over León.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: León is interested in Roxy, and Vilu is devastated. Gregorio announces the students’ lineup for the show, causing trouble for Violetta and Francesca.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: León is upset because he thinks Vilu is standing between him and Roxy. And rehearsal is starting, and Violetta has to be both herself and Roxy.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: After finding out the truth about Roxy, Ludmila has no issue using Vilu’s song at You Mix. Everything’s ready for the On Beat Studio presentation.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: More and more people know Roxy’s true identity, and Violetta feels bad about lying to León. And that lie won’t hold up much longer.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Violetta doesn’t know how to tell León the truth. On Beat Studio can’t find a sponsor, and it’s falling on hard times.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: León doesn’t want to lose Roxy, so he decides he has to find her, whatever it takes. The students look for a way to help On Beat Studio.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Roxy is leading to more and more arguments between León and Vilu. Francesca and Diego are having trouble hiding their love.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: One last meeting between León and Roxy is all Vilu needs to tell the truth. On Beat Studio has some bad news for the students.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: When he finds out Vilu is Roxy, León can’t forgive her dishonesty, and he feels devastated that his friends would hide the truth from him.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Vilu wants León back, but Gery pretends to be her and gets between them. Francesca can’t summon the courage to tell Vilu how she feels about Diego.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Vilu gets a chance to tell León she’s sorry, but he decides to move on with his life. Priscila will stop at nothing to weaken Violetta.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Gery sets an ambitious plan in motion to get Vilu to leave León. Priscila is extremely jealous to see how close Germán and Angie are.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Ludmila plans to reveal Fran and Diego’s secret to Vilu. The boys’ band is getting more confident, while On Beat Studio is in danger of shutting down.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Vilu is hurt and disappointed that Francesca refused to have faith in her. Meanwhile, a new star arrives at You Mix.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: The presentation of the competition online suffers a potentially fatal setback, and a backhanded press campaign tars Ludmila’s image.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: On Beat Studio may receive outside funding. In order to receive the money, one student will have to continue her studies abroad.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Matilda’s arrival awakens envy and jealousy in the girls at On Beat Studio. As Jade tells Germán it’s over, Vilu decides to fight for León.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Vilu is worried about Fran and makes Diego come to his senses and take advantage of every moment they have left. León gets some relationship advice.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: A change in the management of On Beat Studio creates chaos and commotion in the institution. León receives a message from Vilu that infuriates him.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Vilu is worried, trying to figure out how to tell León how she really feels. Germán feels guilty for getting between his daughter and León.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Vilu wants to be happy, and in order to make it happen, she’s willing to leave her past with León behind. And there’s big news at the On Beat Studio.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Vilu’s attitude has Alex excited, and Ludmila’s sincerity may cause problems with You Mix. Vilu encourages Angie to follow her heart.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: There’s a tightrope to walk between helping On Beat Studio and observing the exclusivity contract with the record label. Vilu receives some bad news.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: León refuses to offer his garage as a rehearsal space so he can avoid Vilu. Vilu is growing more and more suspicious of Priscila.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Vilu is happy that a misunderstanding has been cleared up, but her optimism crumbles when she hears León getting some bad news about the show.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: León decides to talk with Vilu, but first she’s going to make a recording that will make life hard for Angie and Germán. Ludmila considers returning.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: León realizes Vilu is worth fighting for, so he goes after her, but he’s surprised by her curt response. A new star brings trouble to You Mix.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Vilu receives encouraging news about León. Priscila’s decision may ruin their chances of getting a big star to take part in their DVD recording.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Vilu and León talk about their feelings and fears, and they come to an agreement on their relationship. On Beat Studio is threatened once again.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: As the conditions for On Beat Studio to be reopened are in the works, Vilu offers her house for practice, but the first rehearsal doesn’t end well.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: On Beat Studio reopens its doors and decisions are made of how to deal with the record label and the contest. Vilu and León grow closer.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: León confesses to Vilu the way he feels when they sing together. Priscila pressures her daughter over her decisions and Angie’s presence in the house.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Vilu and León are having trouble fulfilling their promise to stay friends. Priscila is furious about Angie and Germán. Ludmila feels betrayed.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Vilu tells León how sad she is about the sale of the On Beat Studio. Disappointed with Priscila and Ludmila, Vilu decides to turn to Germán.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Vilu’s fall brings a lot of suspicions along with drastic measures and false accusations. León helps straighten out what happened.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: With some help from her friends, Vilu finds a way to figure out who sabotaged her. The On Beat Studio students receive a tempting invitation to Spain.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Gery sets a new plan in motion to get between Violetta and León. Germán’s accusation has Ludmila feeling relieved.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: The students have a chance to hear an international band play live. Vilu’s innovatie proposal has the On Beat Studio artists very interested.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Vilu and León can’t come to an agreement about their relationship. Ludmila has to figure out what she wants to do with her future. Alex is exposed.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Clement’s secret shocks On Beat Studio. León wants to tell Vilu how he feels, but something happens between Vilu and Clement that has him doubting.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: León is disappointed in Gery for hiding Alex’s identity from him. Ludmila asks Vilu for advice in a difficult situation, and Priscila won’t give up.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: León finds out there’s an agreement keeping him away from Gery. Angie confronts Germán. Clement has to choose between his career and his family.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Vilu comes up with a plan to get Clement to return to On Beat Studio, but León refuses to help. Angie distrusts Priscila, and Germán offers to help.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Priscila endangers Vilu, Angie and Ludmila. Clement, tired of all the lies, decides to reveal the whole truth to León.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Vilu and León get in a big fight and look for a replacement for the Sevilla show, but Fran and Diego find something that will get them back on track.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: The On Beat Studio students rehearse for the Sevilla festival, but their personal issues are getting in the way in the group number.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: As Fran and Diego tour Cádiz, Vilu plans a date between Germán and Angie in Seville. And there are confessions, misunderstandings and reconciliations.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: The day has arrived, and the On Beat Studio students have a chance to shine onstage, where a promise of love puts a smile on everyone’s face.
episodes.title: Episode 80
